summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on June 25, 2024, at 1:30 PM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss and make recommendations regarding the appointment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of the minutes from the June 4, 2024 meeting.
2. Executive session to deliberate on the possible appointment and employment of judges.
3. Consideration of recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission for the selection of judges.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will include an executive session under Section 551.074 of the Texas Open Meetings Act, allowing the committee to discuss sensitive employment matters related to judicial appointments. The agenda emphasizes the importance of confidentiality in these discussions.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is seeking approval for the recommendations regarding the selection of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges, which will be crucial for filling these judicial positions. The committee will also vote on the approval of the previous meeting's minutes. 

This meeting is accessible to the public both in-person and via videoconference, ensuring transparency and community engagement.
